name: OxygenSaturationSpO2byPulseOximetry
title: Oxygen Saturation (SpO2) by Pulse Oximetry
description: LOINC clinical concepts that represent oxygen saturation measured by pulse oximetry. Derived from US Core Pulse Oximetry Profile. Updated for LOINC, 2.76  update
